@desoul Betrayal is not necessarily connected to ntr. NTR is the author making you feel bad feelings like anger, sadness etc. And despite not having betrayal until literally the end of the doujin, you knowing the characters ends up making you a little miserable to know that the trash friend is fucking the girl and the guy who likes and loves her is not

Why is it marked as Notare and Cheating? There was no cheating or notare.

They were not in a relationship and had no moral obligation towards one another.

It was just a one-sided crush, from the perspective of the guy in glasses.

Man stories like these make you feel for the MC.

@Jerichow like metroid said, she wasn't with him at the time. She had the chance to leave him...but she probably really didn't want to hurt the dynamic anymore than it already was at that point. The friends a douche, but more than hurting his bestfriend, I think he just got a high off doing it behind his back, knowing he wanted her, and since she was forced into those positions, she probably had no place to really step away from it either. Once it was all figured out though, she showed where her true feelings are, its true, shes a bit slutty, she obviously doesn't want to give up either of them, but shes obviously favoring the MC over the friend and probably thats going to be her big turn around on him.
Little did they know satoshi had a stand that could stop time and beat the fuck outta them because of this

@jerichow But she wasnt romantically involved in with his best friend when he made her fuck buddy read the story again. And you must be butthurt seeing how you are writinh wall of texts over a simple ntr manga

@ Ravenleaf - Yeah I think she knew part way through it was MC.

However, the 'friend' is a piece of shit, plain and simple, and yes, he absolutely did do things wrong. You don't EVER make a move on, or try to make a fuck-buddy out of the girl your best friend is romantically involved in. The fact that he even made that offer of, "Be my sex friend if you can't get me off in an hour" should have earned him a five-star palm across the face.

Buuuut instead, because the girl is a fucking idiot, like most NTR story girls are, she decides to go along with it... dunno f'king WHY, but then where I lose all faith in her and stop caring is when the friend offers her the easiest way out, to just walk out and confess..... the stupid bitch doesn't do it! At that point I'm like, "I hope you get pregnant, Souta leaves you because he doesn't wanna be a dad, MC finds out, and also leaves you because he's not going to raise that piece of shit's kid, and you grow up a single mom with a shitty life."
This is f*cked up in many ways... but i believe the guy knew she was  being F8cked.
The girl knew exactly what was going on.
Got a friend like that before and it sure is hard being the 'third' guy watching them lovey-dovey with each other. Thank God I wasn't interested on the girl.
cringey-land again
